EmailTemplate.name: Non-Standard Implementation Approval Request
EmailTemplate.subject: {!MPM4_BASE__Milestone1_Project__c.Name} - Non-Standard Implementation Approval Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!MPM4_BASE__Milestone1_Project__c.Sales_Engineer__c},
{!MPM4_BASE__Milestone1_Project__c.LastModifiedBy} has confirmed that the configuration of the accounts for Project {!MPM4_BASE__Milestone1_Project__c.Name} is complete.
Please check that the configuration matches the SOW, then reply to this email with either "approved" or "rejected" in the first line of the email (do not tab down) or click this link. You can add comments by entering them on the second line in the body of your email.
If there are any issues with this email please contact your Salesforce Administrator
